description: black and white image; male figure on right holding a cup in PL hand, and a beaker in PR hand, wearing a checkered coat and glasses; zigzagging pattern in top left edge of image; bottle and covered potted plant in upper right edge of image; groups of flowers in front center and in LLC of image; several intricate patterns make up negative space in image; three symbols encased in circular curving elements in bottom left edge of image
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: ALABAMA BIOCHEMIST| LLC on sheet, in pencil: #20
provenance: (Steven Thomas, Woodstock, Vt., until 2017; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19)
signed: bottom right margin, in pencil: Helen West Heller 1947
title: Alabama Biochemist
